    • Uses of KeyBag in com.google.bitcoin.core

      Classes in com.google.bitcoin.core that implement KeyBag 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Wallet
      A Wallet stores keys and a record of transactions that send and receive value from those keys.
      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type KeyBag 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ECKey TransactionOutPoint.getConnectedKey(KeyBag keyBag)
      Returns the ECKey identified in the connected output, for either pay-to-address scripts or pay-to-key scripts.
      RedeemData TransactionOutPoint.getConnectedRedeemData(KeyBag keyBag)
      Returns the RedeemData identified in the connected output, for either pay-to-address scripts, pay-to-key or P2SH scripts.
      RedeemData TransactionInput.getConnectedRedeemData(KeyBag keyBag)
      Alias for getOutpoint().getConnectedRedeemData(keyBag)

    • Uses of KeyBag in com.google.bitcoin.wallet

      Classes in com.google.bitcoin.wallet that implement KeyBag 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DecryptingKeyBag
      A DecryptingKeyBag filters a pre-existing key bag, decrypting keys as they are requested using the provided AES key.
      class  KeyChainGroup
      A KeyChainGroup is used by the Wallet and manages: a BasicKeyChain object (which will normally be empty), and zero or more DeterministicKeyChains.
